name: Cloud Provider Selection PRD (AWS vs Firebase vs Others)

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Decision framework to select a primary platform between AWS, Firebase, or alternatives based on product needs, team skills, and constraints.

sections.title: Decision Criteria
sections.content: Latency, scale, data residency, compliance, time-to-market, managed services fit, lock-in risk, team expertise, cost model (CapEx/OpEx).

sections.title: AWS Profile
sections.content: EC2/ECS/EKS for control and scale; RDS/Aurora; API Gateway + Lambda; IAM and Organizations; best for complex, scalable, multi-service backends.

sections.title: Firebase Profile
sections.content: Auth, Firestore, Functions, Hosting; rapid prototyping and mobile/web apps; great for realtime and small teams; lock-in considerations.

sections.title: Hybrid & Migration
sections.content: Start on Firebase; migrate hot paths to AWS microservices over time; data export strategies; auth federation; cost control and observability.
